entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 2:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: N 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
